name: 蔡一豪
objective:
課程旨在介紹和深入探討電路分析的進階概念和技術。將涵蓋正弦穩態功率計算、平衡三相電路、拉普拉斯變換及其在電路分析中的應用、頻率選擇電路、主動濾波電路、傅立葉級數和傅立葉轉換、雙埠網路等主題，旨在培養學生在電路設計與分析方面的能力。
This course aims to introduce and delve into advanced concepts and techniques in circuit analysis. It will cover topics such as sinusoidal steady-state power calculation, balanced three-phase circuits, Laplace transforms and their applications in circuit analysis, frequency selective circuits, active filter circuits, Fourier series and Fourier transforms, and two-port networks. The course is designed to develop students' abilities in circuit design and analysis.
